title: Writing Course: Teaching the Time-Efficient Principles of Planning and Writing a Book
description: This comprehensive handbook teaches the principles underpinning time-efficient book-writing. Through 8 modules, each with its own corresponding assignment, the book—adopting a writing course approach—breaks down the task of writing a book (fiction or non-fiction) into the various fundamental components, including Preparation, Deciding between fiction and non-fiction (and accordingly assessing market demand), Character profiling, Creating a unique book blueprint, Dialogue, The writing process, Editing and, finally, Publishing.
author: Hayley Paige
